name: Shameless(UK) (Season 2)
info:
• 中文名: 无耻之徒(英版) 第二季
  • 主演: James McAvoy
  • 集数: 11
  • 开始: 2004-12-23
  • 结束: 2005-03-08
  • 类型: 喜剧
  • 国家/地区: 英国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 频道: Channel 4

eps.name: Grandad
eps.desc: Frank pretends to get a job to keep his visiting father off his back, Karen gets a job at The Jockey.

eps.name: Eric
eps.desc: Kev and Veronica get a visit from a Social Worker and foster a troubled young boy. Kev helps him learn to defend himself from the school bullies bothering him.

eps.name: The Garden Competition
eps.desc: Veronica and Carol battle over the local gardening competition, first prize a years free rent. Frank is left to look after Delia and Nigel and The Jockey is raided by the police and closed for serving past closing hours

eps.name: The Big Day
eps.desc: Tony discovers Steve's car full of money and drugs when he steals it as a joke, causing Tony to attempt a sting of the drug dealers Steve is dropping off to which goes wrong, resulting in a warrant for Steve's arrest and him having to flee Chatsworth.

eps.name: Crooks and Robbers
eps.desc: Lip is framed for burglary, Debbie rents out video's copied from Kash's shop only for someone to accidentally return a sex tape featuring the local lollipop lady!

eps.name: Welcome to the Family
eps.desc: Lip gets Mandy pregnant while she is pretending to be Ian's girlfriend to cover his sexuality, leading to the Maguire's welcoming Ian to the family, so long as he marries Mandy! Fiona is mugged.

eps.name: Joey Dawson
eps.desc: Liam swallows Fiona's contraceptive tablets leading to a visit from a Social Worker, only the social worker happens to be a girl Fiona bullied in school, Fiona has sex with new man Craig.

eps.name: Against the Odds
eps.desc: Fiona quits her job and admits she's pregnant by Craig, Frank is coerced into suing the Karib's when he injures himself on their door, forcing them to close the shop.
